name: Design%2FEngineering Contact
title: DSGCON
example:
J%20O
H
N
S
M
I
T
H
definition: Identifies the employee of the customer or agent who should be contacted on design/engineering/translation issues and to whom the Design Layout Report may be sent.
usageNotes: Required when the ACT field is "N", "C", "M", or "T", otherwise prohibited.
fieldNotes: If DSGCON represents a customer different from the CCNA, the Design Routing Code  ( DRC )  field may be populated for proper DLR distribution.

Ty pes of routing and or translation changes that require coordination are CIC redirects, switch conversions, mutual trunking arrangement, point code changes, traffic rehome/reroutes, call through testing requests, etc.
